_comment: a_core - core radius [m], a_clad - cladding radius [m], alpha - fibre absorption, L - length of the fiber [m], wavelength_max,wavelength_min - the wavelength range on which the dispersion is empirically determined, parameters for Sellmeier eqn: B,C - core; Bcl,Ccl - cladding, tp - pulse duration [s], lambda0 - central wavelength [m], c - speed of light [m/s]
